EmailTemplate.subject: Summer and Livongo!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Happy Friday {!Contact.FirstName},
It’s that time of year again, sweet signs of summer and upcoming mid-year launches. As you schedule your June/July customer conversations, keep in mind, Livongo for Diabetes and Hypertension is embedded in Enable, Empower+, and HAS. With over 3.4 million members in a WBM package, there is a great opportunity to grow our partnership and offer an impactful solution to persons living with diabetes and hypertension.
Why Livongo - Livongo brings a proven whole-person approach and delivers the critical “trifecta”:
- A demonstrated ROI of $108-$131 PPPM for diabetes and $54 PPPM for hypertension. - Within 90 days, a 0.9 A1c reduction which is sustained for duration of membership. - An experience members love demonstrated by an NPS score of 66, not only leading healthcare, but on par with the world’s best consumer brands like Netflix.
Even better news - Livongo is priced PPPM (per participant per month), whether you have 1 or many people with diabetes and hypertension, the client is only charged for those who enroll in the program.
Let’s team - to bring the impactful financial and clinical outcomes to your clients. Livongo offers support throughout the sales cycle:
- Request a pre-sale analytics report to wow the client or a Livongo led product demo. - Position Livongo as an embedded feature of Enable, Empower+, and HAS with your clients so it’s easy to get started. - Through Salesforce you can document the opportunity enabling HCSC and Livongo to forecast project demand for 2020. - Populate the intake form to initiate the client implementation process.
If you have any questions or requests, please contact myself or Connor Nystuen (contact information below).
Now, go enjoy your weekend on this rare day of sunshine. We look forward to working with you this summer.
Best,
Kara
